summary: A man tries to find out who his real mother is after the woman who raised him tells him the truth.
cast: Leslie Cheung|Maggie Cheung|Andy Lau|Carina Lau|Rebecca Pan|Jacky Cheung|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Danilo Antunes|Mei-Mei Hung|Ling-Ling Hung|Tita Muñoz|Alicia Alonzo|Elena Lim So|Maritoni Fernandez|Angela Ponos|Nonong Talbo
title: Días salvajes
